reviewText: Pete describes how to slap the bass in different styles slow to fast slapping. He shows ist right away on his bass, he gives also advices for strings and gap between strings and fingerboard. You should know about music theorie, the harmonics and double bass technik, then it's a great pleasure to watch Pete slap practices

Pete is a great player and this DVD really helped get me going in the beginning.  Still go back to it
occasionally.  Also, happen to really like his style, along with a little o' WIllie Dixon maybe : )
